message: All I can see are shoes, a frothing ocean of plastic and leather.
Slurred voices rain down on my head. The shoes keep moving, pounding against me.
I try to get up, but my arms won't cooperate.
I feel sick, like my stomach is up in my throat. My head is killing me too.

name: 蓮
message: "Aoba, please be careful. Your peripheral nervous system is impaired."

name: 男性客Ａ
message: "Hey, you deaf? Get your ass off the floor or we'll strip you naked."

name: 女性客Ａ
message: "Ahahaha, what's the big deal? Just do it already! He's not gonna move."
Someone grabs me by the arm and starts to pull.
I have to get away... but my head is killing me. I can't think through the pain.
